controls.object.dialog-header.zh: 选择要用于[b]{0}[/b]参数的对象：
controls.object.dialog-header.en: Pick an object to use for the [b]{0}[/b] parameter:

controls.object.pick-message.title.zh: 在 {0} 中选择一个对象

controls.object.pick-message.message.en: Click the button to pick an object.

controls.key.pick-message.message.zh: 单击按钮并选择一个按键。
controls.key.pick-message.message.en: Click the button and choose a key.

controls.instance-variable.pick-message..zh: 该对象'{0}'没有可用的实例变量，在使用之前创建一个。
controls.instance-variable.pick-message..en: The object '{0}' has no instance variables that can be shown here. Create one before using this.

controls.event-variable.pick-message.mes.zh: 此范围中没有全局变量或局部变量。 首先在事件表中创建一个
controls.event-variable.pick-message.mes.en: There are no global or local variables in this scope. Create one in the event sheet first.

controls.audio-file.pick-message.message.zh: 项目中没有音频文件。 在使用之前导入一些。
controls.audio-file.pick-message.message.en: There are no audio files in the project. Import some before using this.

controls.project-file.pick-message.messa.zh: 没有项目文件。 在使用之前导入一些。
controls.project-file.pick-message.messa.en: There are no project files. Import some before using this.

controls.audio-file.cannot-preview-messa.zh: 此音频文件不能在这里预览。
controls.audio-file.cannot-preview-messa.en: This audio file cannot be previewed here.

controls.timeline.pick-message.message.zh: 项目 '{0}' 尚未添加时间轴，请先创建一个。
controls.timeline.pick-message.message.en: The project '{0}' has no timelines that can be shown here. Create one before using this.

controls.function.pick-message.message.zh: 项目 '{0}' 中暂时没有能在这里显示的动作组。请确保动作组的返回类型为 '无' 。
controls.function.pick-message.message.en: The project '{0}' has no functions that can be shown here. Create one with return type 'None' before using this.

controls.transition.pick-message.message.zh: 此项目 '{0}' 还没有曲线可使用，请先新建一个。
controls.transition.pick-message.message.en: The project '{0}' has no eases that can be shown here. Create one before using this.

controls.tilemapbrush.pick-message.messa.zh: 对象 '{0}' 在瓦片栏编辑器中还没有创建自动笔刷，请先添加一个。
controls.tilemapbrush.pick-message.messa.en: The object '{0}' has no tilemap brushes that can be shown here. Create one before using this.

controls.flowchart.pick-message.message.zh: 当前项目 '{0}' 尚未新建流程图，请先在项目文件夹中创建再使用。
controls.flowchart.pick-message.message.en: The project '{0}' has no flowcharts that can be shown here. Create one before using this.

description_en: The Parameters dialog appears after the Add condition/action dialog , or when editing a condition or action . It allows you to enter parameters such as the X and Y co-ordinate for the Sprite object's Set Position action (shown below). It does not appear for conditions or actions which do not use any parameters, such as the Destroy action. Expressions can be entered for many parameters, which can be anything from a simple value to a sophisticated mathematical calculation. The parameters that are
